ftbquests.chapter.attack_of_the_drones.q: &6亚马龙贸易网络&r提供各种随机预设的村民交易，这些交易将在每个游戏日刷新一次。一些整合包或模组的特定交易将始终存在，所以务必要定期查看！
我们狂热的探险家们大概会对&d末影苹果&r贸易特别感兴趣。一个末影苹果可以换取一本&6跃行附魔书&r。附在靴子上时，它将为你提供永久的自动跳跃。非常适合周围那些大大小小的山！
漫游
&b压力室&r是一个来自气动工艺的多方块机器。给它提供压力即可将物品压缩成新的物品。
压力室多方块结构为一个3x3x3、4x4x4或5x5x5的空心立方体结构。更大的压力室可以存储更多的物品以进行更高级的配方，但其升压的速度也更慢。
要建造&6压力室&r，首先需要使用&b压力室墙壁&r来建造框架。如果你愿意，墙壁的表面也可以不用墙壁，用&b压力室玻璃&r来建造。

To interact with the Pressure Chamber, we'll need to use at least 2 &6Pressure Chamber Interfaces&r. Depending on how you place them will determine whether it can pull in items, or push them out. The square is the input side, and the circle is the output!
For the Chamber to compress items, we'll need to pump in compressed air into a &6Pressure Chamber Valve&r.
宝贵的压力
通入压缩空气后，&b空气接口&r可以用来像容器一样访问玩家物品栏。对其进行的物品出入都将应用到玩家的物品栏。
默认四个侧面用来访问主物品栏，上下两面用来访问盔甲栏。侧面配置可以在空气接口的UI中更改。
空气接口还可以通过消耗更多压缩空气来提供类似&6水下呼吸&r的效果。如果你给空气接口通入能量，其还能无线给你物品栏里的物品充能！插入发射器升级后，空气接口可以用来自动喂食和经验输入输出。
This can be used to keep your chestplate charged, and your chestplate can be upgraded to charge all other PNC armors and items.
&6气动装甲&r虽然初始防御力很低，但这套装甲进行可以全面升级。这些升级可以让它提供更高的防御力、盔甲韧性、速度、飞行、夜视等效果！胸甲也可以升级，使其能够为所有气动装备充电。
与其他科技盔甲不同，气动盔甲拥有有限的耐久度，但是可以插入升级以使用压缩空气来修补。
我是（压缩的）钢铁侠！
&b热气动加工机&r用于将液体加工成其他液体，还可以用来裂解燃油。
&bHeavy Fuels&r can be cracked into lighter ones, which means &6Diesel&r can be turned into &6Kerosene&r, which can then turn into &bGasoline&r, and then further into &6LPG&r.
热气动加工机还可以用来制作&a润滑油&r！
Once you have access to &bPolyethylene&r using a Chemical Reactor, you can process in this machine to make &6Plastic Sheets&r for making PCBs!
&6速度升级&r可以在大多数气动工艺的机器上使用。不过需要以更大压力的为代价使它们更快地运转。
&b充气站&r可用于给物品充入&6压缩空气&r，使它们正常工作。
充气站只能将物品加压至与充气站本身气压相同。如果物品的气压比充气站更高，则物品中的压缩空气会进入到充气站中。
&b充气模块&r可被安装在压力管道上，给它面向的容器中的所有物品充气。
如果物品的气压比管道的更大，则还可以让压缩空气从物品进入管道。通过两个同频的末影箱子就可以实现高效&b远程压缩空气传输&r！
按住右键，&6M134型速射机枪&r即可消耗压缩空气来发射加特林机枪弹药。
潜行右击M134型速射机枪以装填至多4盒&b加特林机枪弹药&r。加特林机枪弹药可与药水结合，使被击中的目标获得药水效果。
你可以在充气站中给M134型速射机枪安装各种有用的升级以改进它的功能。
伪装涂覆器可以将可伪装的方块，如管道和热管伪装成其它方块的样子！
手持伪装涂覆器潜行+右击一个方块（如草方块或者钻石块），然后点击任意可伪装的方块以改变它的外观。
&b气压&r是绝大多数气动机器的能源，它的单位是&6bar&r。数值越大，气压就越高。空气会自发的从高气压向低气压运动，以尝试使整个系统气压平衡。
如果机器或管道里的气压超过了承受能力，其就会&c爆炸&r！
气动工艺的机器和工具都有一个特定的&6容量&r（以 ML 为单位），表示在 0 bar 时可容纳多少空气。 可以通过升级容积来增加容积。
Machines use compressed air to operate, which constantly lowers pressure in the system as they consume it.
请务必阅读&6PNC:R 手册&r，了解更多信息。
空气压力
空气压力101
现在我们有了制造压缩铁的方法，就可以开始游玩&b气动工艺&r了！
首先，我们需要制作一些用于输送&6压缩空气&r的&b压力管道&r。如果管道内的压力达到了5.0bar，它就会爆炸。:)
气压的积累和改变需要时间，它不会瞬间传递。气压还依赖于一个&6封闭的系统&r，这意味着它会从开放的管道接口中逸出，降低整个系统中的压力。用&6气动扳手&r右击接口即可将其关闭。
推动压力
&6作物架&r可提升任何种植在上面的树木或作物的生长速度。它们很便宜，而且不需要维护，种田真的很好用！
高速农业！
&b热量&r是气动工具独有的另一种能源。&6热量会分散&r到相邻的区块，包括空气。
If certain heat sources have their heat dispersed entirely, it can convert to a different block. An example of this would be using lava to heat a machine and it eventually cooling to obsidian.
You can prevent heat from dissipating in the air by making sure the block is covered by any block that isnt air. &6Thermal Lagging&r works well for this.

Some operations are endothermic (Heat Using) while others may be exothermic (Heat Producing). This will depend on the machine and recipe so be sure to look at the recipe and plan your heat management accordingly.

An important note is that since these machines share heat, it is often useful to put multiple machines that require similar temperatures touching each other to make heat management easier. You can pipe between them with &6Dispenser Upgrades&r.
热力学
&b涡流管&r利用压缩空气&b制冷一端&r，&c加热&r另一端。
气流越大，温差越大。
&bHeat Sinks&r can help to more quickly dissipate heat from a block they are touching.

Any heat sinks over or under 60/-60C will hurt you if you touch them. The effectiveness can be greatly increased by using an air grate to vent air over the fin. These used in conjunction with vortex tubes should be able to effectively handle all of your heating and cooling requirements.
&b流体搅拌机&r顾名思义，可以混合两种流体。 它既可以制造一种物品，也可以制造另一种液体。
它的其中一个重要用途就是生产&6生物柴油&r，这是你提高发电量的基石。
&6气动发电机&r将多余的压力转化为 FE。
让我们制作一个气动能源炉
压力→FE
虽然价格有点贵，但这台&6太阳能压缩机&r可能是一个有趣的空气压缩机，因为它是一个被动的压力源，可以连接到您的系统上！
在&e&n350°C&r的温度下，它的效率最高。 如果温度过高，机器就会关闭！
让我们来做个太阳能压缩机吧
利用太阳来给你的系统加压
The &6Flux Compressor&r is an Air Compressor that converts &bFE&r or &bEU&r into Pressure!
让我们来做个通量压缩机吧！
在&b压力管道&r上添加一层聚乙烯(塑料)，就可以将其升级为增强压力管道，使其能够承受高达 10 BAR 的压力！(这个东西没有多大的用处，建议基础的管道直接升级到蓝色的高级压力管道)--译者注
&c确保相应地让你的压力系统平衡。&r
使用聚乙烯！
强化压力管道
- &5首先&r，你要制作一个&b编程器&r，用它来编写&b无人机&r要做的事情。
- &5然后&r，请务必随身携带一些&6拼图&r，&n每一步&r代码都需要&6一个拼图&r。
- 此外，随身携带&aGPS 工具&r也很重要，因为您将使用它们为&b无人机&r指令设定坐标。
看似复杂，其实很简单。
无人机收割  第一部分
- 虽然有一种&6预编程的收割无人机&r，但在这次探索中，我们将教你如何自己制作一架，这应该会让你对这种&b编程系统&r的工作原理有一个良好的开端。
- &5有了它&r，你就可以注意到，&b"无人机代码 "&r是通过 &b"代码块/步骤 "&r来完成的，你可以从放置 &b"开始代码块 "&r开始，然后为每个步骤添加一个代码块。(跟scratch似的)--译者注
- &5还要注意&r的是，在添加从箱子中&a收获和/或导入&r物品的命令时，需要一个 &b&n"范围块"&r&r，要轻松添加正确的坐标，只需用 &bGPS 工具&r左键单击，粘贴所需的坐标即可。
- &5别忘了&r，你还可以在某些命令中添加 &a"过滤块"&r，在这段代码中，你可能需要&a为你要使用的锄头&r设置一个 &a"过滤块"&r，而不是默认的下界合金(?)的。
- &5首先&r，确保打开你的&2编程台&r，并导入这些基本代码：
&5还有一个额外的小提示&r，就是在最后添加一个 &9"待机 "&r命令，这样无人机就可以在不需要工作时自动关闭，从而&9避免浪费压力&r。
&o阅读下一个任务，了解如何设置采集无人机的简单教程！&r
&8&o这并不难，在图形用户界面左上方找到 "导入按钮"，然后点击底部的 "从剪贴板粘贴 "选项即可。&r
单击此处获取代码
{image:ftbneotech:textures/quest_zh/quest_drone_1.png width:120 height:100 align:center fit:true}
制作一个基础收割无人机
无人机收割  第二部分

Using the rewards from the previous quest, you should be able to make yourself an &dAmadron Tablet&r. This will allow you to trade on the Amadron network for all sorts of custom and vanilla villager trades!
Make sure you link it to an inventory by sneak+right clicking it and enjoy all of the new trades! You'll also want to make sure to keep it charged.
亚马龙网络
- 虽然已经有&6预编程的采集无人机&r，在这个任务中我们会教你如何自己定制一个。这会成为你了解气动的&b编程系统&r开个好头。
- 如果你&5还没有&r阅读上一个任务，&c&n请务必详尽阅读&r！这里的讲解会相对上个任务要简介许多。
- &5正如先前提到的&r，在已有代码的基础上你只需要将&a具体数值&r改为你需要的值，例如修改&b坐标&r :)
- &5还需注意的是&r，某些 &b"代码块"&r（如 &2"导出到箱子"&r）可能有一些额外的配置选项，可以通过&n右键单击&r来查看，在这种情况下，你可以选择&b无人&r机从哪一边访问&2箱子&r。
- &5首先&r，确保打开你的&2编程台&r，并导入这些基本代码：
&8&o这并不难，在图形用户界面左上方找到 "导入按钮"，然后点击底部的 "从剪贴板粘贴 "选项即可。&r
点击查看代码
{image:ftbneotech:textures/quest_zh/quest_drone_2.png width:120 height:100 align:center fit:true}
制作一个基本的采集无人机
无人机收割 第三部分
&b强化石&r是最先进的气动工艺机器的基础。 它的硬度和耐热性使其成为控制气动设备高气压的完美材料。
您需要大量的这些材料来制作模组中的许多机器！
基本的&b空气压缩机&r是最早和最简单的&6产生压力&r的方法之一。 这种设备会消耗煤或木炭等可燃材料，为气动网络产生气压。 注意不要过度加压，否则你的系统会爆炸！
我们赠送给您一个 &6 安全管道模块&r ，帮助您开始使用。 这些装置现在可能还能用，但不是长期的好办法，因为它们偶尔会释放压力，从而浪费燃料。
&b生产&r &d空气压力&r
By having access to the &6Amadron Tablet&r, you can buy a &bPCB Blueprint&r and make yourself your first &bUV Light Box&r!
This Light Box is needed to expose &bEmpty PCB's&r to UV Light, which is an important process for assembling PCBs. You can make Empty PCBs in the Pressure Chamber!
一个紫外线灯箱
制作电路板！
用紫外线灯箱处理&b空印刷电路板&r后，我们就可以用&6蚀刻器&r来进行进一步处理。
向蚀刻器通入&b蚀刻酸&r以处理经&6紫外线灯箱&r处理过的&b空印刷电路板&r。而蚀刻酸需要&d致毒混合物&r来制作。
If you want the tank to work faster, you can heat it above 50°C, but the Etching Acid will slowly be used due to the heat.
处理成功会获得&6未组装的印刷电路板&r，而处理失败会得到&b失效的印刷电路板&r。
If you want to automate this, you can extract Unassembled PCB's from the sides, and Failed PCB's
from the top/bottom.
把一些&3{item.pneumaticcraft.transistor}&r和&3{item.pneumaticcraft.capacitor}&r安装在&6{item.pneumaticcraft.unassembled_pcb}&r最终会得到&b{item.pneumaticcraft.printed_circuit_board}&r
如果你还没有使用&6压力表管道模块&r来控制你的&3压力系统&r的话，现在开始这样做大概是个好主意。使用&b扩展模块&r可以使这个过程更容易和精确!
给&6压力表管道模块&r安装&b模块扩展卡&r后可以精确控制其输出的&c红石强度&r，甚至建立从压力到红石强度的&e线性映射&r！
让我们来做扩展模块吧！
功能扩展！
&6装配台&r是一种多方块机器，用于进行需要精密操作的配方。装配台的各部分必须相连，并且需要向装配控制器通入气压。
此外，&6装配控制器&r必须插入&b装配程序&r才能工作。大多数配方都需要&b激光程序&r才能进行。
&bAssembly IO Units&r control the input and output of the recipes. They must be able to reach an inventory, such as a chest, and the assembly platform. They can reach anything with a 3x3 area.
装配线
&6Advanced Pressure Tubes&r can handle up to 25 BAR and 4 times the volume.
Before you can connect these to your machines, make sure they can handle the increased volume and pressure, or you can use a &bRegulator&r instead!
高级压力管道
ftbquests.chapter.caveman_exploring.ques: 像大部分Minecraft冒险那样，让我们从撸树开始吧！不过……难道只有这种获得木头的方式吗？没错！神圣的行为永远不会被整合包制作者修改！
&b你的第一节必修课——&r&2原木&r
在开始冒险之前，你应该制作一些专业工具！
一把&b木镐&r和一套&b石制工具&r非常适合你过渡到铁或更多高级材料。
专业工具
在前期，你可以从野外找到各种各样的食物！找些食物准备出发，但是前期最好多从树上摘些&c苹果&r。
你可以用这些来驯服一匹&6马&r，这是长途旅行必备的坐骑。
一天一苹果
&b马&r有多种多样的样貌和颜色，而且它们还有不同的属性！通过在头部穿戴&6单片眼镜&r并潜行，你将能够看到马的属性。繁育马匹来获得更好的属性将是一节很有趣的事，但目前，任何一只马都能够帮助你穿越地形。
首先，你需要&a使用马刷怪蛋&r来获得一匹马！生成之后，你就可以开始通过喂苹果来驯服它，并且尝试右击来骑乘。它可能会把你甩下来一段时间，但是坚持多次骑乘直到冒出爱心，证明你已经驯服它了！
当你将马驯服后，你可以给其戴上鞍来骑乘。这样这匹马就会与你绑定，当你按下&6&n默认X键&r就能召唤你的坐骑。
骑马时，默认按Y键进入战斗模式，该模式允许在骑乘时自由角度的瞄准和使用武器。
嗨哟，马儿！我们走！
与马结缔友谊
默认情况下，小地图处于关闭状态直到制作出第一张地图。
地图由纸和一个指南针合成，并将实时提供附近区域的渲染以及你在其上的位置。通常情况下，在这个整合包中你需要非常多的纸，所以为了帮助解决这个问题，这里有颗纸树。
当它们长大时，树皮也会随之成熟。我们可以用斧头右击获得纸。同时树皮可以用骨粉加快生长。
&6&n提示：&r如果你需要很多甘蔗，可以尝试制作&a子沙&r。当你在子沙上种植仙人掌或甘蔗时，你可以放置拉杆在子沙附近并且不停拉动拉杆，子沙上的作物将会加快生长。
对探索的甜蜜渴望
把&b地图&r放在手上，你就可以连接全球制图系统了。现在应该可以使用小地图以及全屏地图，默认按M键开启。在这里，可以为位置设置坐标点，并查看你或其他人已声明或强制加载的区块。
开启制图
&d发现北斗信号&r！
通过把&6工作台&r和箱子组合，你将会赋予它一个&d保存&r魔咒，这多亏了Enchanted Blocks模组。
当你关闭工作台界面时，这个高级的工作台将保留其物品栏的物品。
保存工作台
更好的&6工作台&r
在早期，&b工业大麻种子&r非常有助于获得线，它也可以用来制作&6坚韧布料&r。如果你打算制作&6背包&r，这将非常重要！
ftbquests.chapter.caveman_goes_tech.ques: 开采一些&6粗铁矿石&r并用它们粗糙的制作一把&b工程师锤&r。尽管现在它不是&o最优&r选择，但眼下我们仍可以用它来粉碎矿石。
使用这把锤子，你可以在你合成栏中将&6粗铁矿石&r变成&6细小的粉末&r。在熔炉中熔炼这些铁粉来获得你的第一批铁锭！
锤子对于&e沉浸工程&r多方块结构的一锤定音也同样终要！
&6工程师锤&r
在你可以制造一些铁锭后，你可以制造一个&b锤锻台&r！这可以让你粉碎任何矿石甚至可以将锭加工成板，环，杆等形状。
奇特魔咒
虽然这做起来很简单，但从锤子的制造成本考虑，这种制造材料的方法被认为是非常低效的。
你应该尽快进步到使用&6蒸汽研磨机&r来替代你完成这些工具。
你现在有了铁的来源，你可以尝试制作一个铁砧来将你获得的附魔书敲到机器上。如果你运气绝佳找到了一个&d附魔台&r，那你还有更多的附魔选择！否则你得等到你拥有了装配机才能自己进行附魔台的制作。
这个任务开启了以下章节：
&e沉浸工程&r&6高炉&r仍可以熔炼&6钢&r并且不再需要&7蒸汽&r。缺点是熔炼速度变慢，高炉砖也需要&6蒸汽高炉&r来完成制作。你可以自由&l选择&r是否使用这个多方块结构。
沉浸工程高炉

The &6Wrench&r and You!
&b青铜锅炉&r是你第一台用于生产&7蒸汽&r的机器，旨在为青铜时代的科技提供动力！
为了让他正常运转，需要先将&9水&r灌入其中，不仅可以使用水桶手动灌水，还可以使用&6水泵&r和管道来自动灌水。这台机器还需要一点&6可燃燃料&r，像是煤炭或者木炭，接着它就可以开始工作了！
在你讲两种原料放入锅炉后，就可以从有方形的输出面泵出&7蒸汽&r，你也可以使用&6扳手&r来改变它的输出面！
&6青铜熔炉&r和&6研磨机&r是你应该最先制造的基础机器。

&b研磨机&r可以使矿石增产并可以从少量物品中获得副产品。你可以使用从之前的任务奖励中获得的钻石锤来采集黑曜石！

现代工业化的&b蒸汽焦炉&r比沉浸工程的焦炉速度更快，但是需要&7蒸汽&r才能持续运转。它是一个和普通焦炉类似的多方块结构，只是需要&6物品和流体出入口&r来正常运转。
虽然这看起来非常麻烦，但是绝对值得制作！这个焦炉需要2个&6输入口&r：一个用来输送&b蒸汽&r（被视为液体），另外一个用于输入&6煤炭&r。这会产出2个需要&6输出口&r的副产物——杂酚油和焦煤！
更快的焦炉
&b焦炉&r需要时间将&6煤炭&r转换为&6焦煤&r。
要建造一座焦炉，你需要用&6焦炉砖&r摆成一个3x3x3的正方体，然后使用&6工程师锤&r右击任意一面中间的方块来完成这个多方块结构。
在这个过程中会产生一种名为&6杂酚油&r的副产物。你可以把它作为燃料使用，或用于制作&6防腐木板&r和&6防腐木棍&r。
较慢的焦炉
在&6高炉&r中熔炼&b生铁粉&r即可获得&6钢&r。&6蒸汽高炉&r会比沉浸工程中的高炉熔炼速度更快。
沉浸工程中的&6高炉&r不需要&7蒸汽&r进行运转，并且之后可以使用&6高炉预热器&r进行升级。但不管怎么说你都是需要基础的&7蒸汽&r&6高炉&r来制作&6沉浸工程的高炉砖&r。
ftbquests.chapter.dire_technologies.ques: 不同等级的黏浆都能加工前一等级的物品，因此没有理由不使用目前能制作的最好的黏浆。 尽管如此，有些材料确实需要更好的黏浆。 下一种材料是金块，您需要在金块旁边放上 &b烈焰绽放黏浆&r。 消耗完黄金后，您就可以得到新材料，然后将其合金化成金锭。
到末地获取一些龙息，并让您的 LV 基础设施运转起来后，您就可以使用虚空微光黏浆了。 这将使您能够制作&b天青宝石&r。
最终极的金属，日蚀锭结合了幽冥和虚空精华，创造出能力无与伦比的工具。 每种工具的独特能力都会被放大到极致。 你的矿石扫描仪会变成 X-ray(俗称矿透)，你可以一次破坏最大 7x7 的区域，还能瞬间打碎方块！ 与天青宝石一样，您也可以制造一个具备所有能力的镐尖斧。
由虚空微光黏浆吸收钻石块制成。 工具和武器的三级原料。
天青宝石工具继承了以前所有工具的能力，但也获得了新的能力，即通过潜行+右键单击来启用&b传送 模式&r，从而与库存绑定。 一旦绑定，击杀怪物、收获或采矿时掉落的物品都将直接传送到绑定的库存中！
此外，天青宝石工具现在使用的是&b使用能量&r而不是耐久，因此需要便携式电源。 个人发电机或电池可以很好地解决这个问题。
烈焰绽放浆土的生长速度比上一级更高。 您需要一把烈焰绽放锄头来制造这种土壤。 在这种土壤上完全生长的作物会自动收割，然后在几秒钟内脱落。
观察烈焰绽放浆土
虚空微光浆土还能更快地提高生长速度，并能将其自动收获的作物传送到与您创建土壤的锄头相连的库存中！
观察虚空微光浆土
在所有土壤中，阴影脉冲浆土的生长速度提升幅度最大，并保持了虚空微光浆土传送收获作物的能力。
观察阴影脉冲浆土
使用铁磁芯锭、珍珠和钻石，您可以创建一个可以配置高度的物品收集器。 它可以拾取可配置范围内的任何物品，并将其存入所附带的库存中。
从焦煤块转化而来的能量密度仍在继续！ 将焦煤块转化为炽热余烬的过程中，通常会出现电力生产方面的净损失，但在某些配方和进一步转化为更高层次的燃料时，您会需要它。
&n注：&r更高级的煤炭燃烧速度更快，在个人发电机和简单发电机中每秒产生的能量也更多。 高达 960 FE/t。 这对于提供足够的动力以满足更高级工具的能源需求非常重要。
能量密度的最后一级。 与前一级一样，每次收获只能获得 1-2 个，但平均能量密度将远远超过开始时的原煤块。
能量密度会继续增加，这次每种矿石只能获得 1-2 个，但总体而言，材料的净能量密度会增加。

These simple blocks do what you'd expect, they will break or place blocks in the world and can be controlled by redstone. The more advanced versions can place and break large areas at once for some very interesting automations.
最后一级黏浆将带您进入黑暗深渊（&aDeep Dark&r）。 你需要收集一些幽冥和回响碎片，注入到&b暗影脉冲黏浆&r中。
这个黏浆可以让你将一块&b下界合金&r转化为日蚀锭，所有顶级工具和机器都是用日蚀锭制造的。 小心监守者……

These simple generators provide a small amount of FE energy to power devices. The speed at which they produce FE will dynamically scale with the type of fuel you use. If you use higher tier Goo coals like Blaze Ember, Void Flame or Eclipse Ember coals it will produce more FE/T.
The swapper will &bswap&r two blocks. You used the wrench to link to the source swapper by &nright clicking&r.

Once you've set the source coordinates you right click on the destination swapper with the bound wrench to bind the destination swapper. In the interface you can set it to &bswap&r blocks or entities (Useful for moving mobs or animals large distances). When you're ready to swap just give the block a &4redstone pulse&r with a button and off it goes!
You need two of them.
The energy transmitter accepts energy from its bottom side and distributes forge energy to all machines in range that can accept energy.

Celestigem and Eclipse Ingots are capable of making a multitool called a Paxel. It combines all of the other tools into a super tool which can perform all of the special abilities of the other tools and be enchanted.
原煤是煤的略微浓缩版。 将煤块或木炭放在原始凝胶旁边，它就会发生转化。 每次收获会得到 3-4 块原煤，每块原煤的燃值是普通煤的 3 倍。
它们还有一个好处，就是可以变成焦煤。 这是将木炭树农场转化为焦煤的一种非常有效的方法。
&b铁磁芯工具&r具有与生俱来的采矿属性，使其优于原版的铁制工具。
本模组中所有更高级的工具都具有前一个工具的特性，所以不用担心会不会留下曾经的升级！
按住 shift 键，同时将鼠标悬停在工具上，即可查看其特殊能力。 您可以在按住工具的同时潜行+右键单击，打开其选项菜单，在这里您可以设置其能力的键位绑定，或切换每个能力的开启或关闭。
任意铁磁芯工具
铁磁芯工具
燃料罐允许您插入任何可燃燃料，并将其计入内部燃料值。 然后，您就可以在任何熔炉中使用燃料筒本身来提供燃料。 非常方便！
铁磁芯和更好的材料锄有一种独特的能力，可以将农田变成原始黏浆农田。 这种农田无法被践踏。 每一层土壤都会获得更多能力。
初等凝胶浆土的生长速度也略有提高，可以支持甘蔗和仙人掌的生长。
观察初等凝胶浆土
口袋发电机是一种便携式电池源，可以插入任何可燃燃料（或者燃料罐）并将其转化为 FE 能量。 这些 FE 能量可以用来为您库存中任何需要 FE 的设备充电。
由 &b烈焰绽放黏浆&r 吸收金块制成。 工具和武器的二级原料。
烈焰金工具也可以用 &4熔岩&r 修复！ 真不错
ftbquests.chapter.equivalency.quests8.su: 它们中的某几个真的很大
ftbquests.chapter.equivalency.title: 等价交换
要增强你的装备和机器，你需要一个&6附魔台&r来为你的物品附上随机的魔咒，或者使用&6铁砧&r来为它们附上&6附魔书&r中的魔咒。
大多数原版方块都可以使用附魔台或铁砧附魔。这里有几个可重复任务用于获取附魔书。2个基础的等级1魔咒结合在一起就可以变为更高等级的魔咒。制作一些基础的方块，你将获得一些魔咒，来自己尝试一下！
挖掘方块，但不将它们破坏成粗矿或碎片。对长线加工或移动玻璃这样的脆弱方块十分有用。
储存魔咒增加箱子或木桶的栏位，随着等级的升高增加更多。
保存魔咒允许像工作台和箱子这样的方块保存其中的物品。
输出升级使容器自动将它的产物输出到邻近的方块。例如一个熔炉或高炉自动将产物输出到木桶中。
速度魔咒通常会加快方块的运行速度，例如熔炼速度或漏斗的传输速度。
太阳辐射可以将熔炉转化为太阳能熔炉。你依然可以在夜晚或坏天气为它添加普通燃料，但除此之外，只要它们与天空之间没有阻隔，即使没有燃料，他们也能熔炼物品。
燃料效率魔咒使方块缓慢燃烧燃料，使单个燃料熔炼更多物品。
有时你会得到附有你不喜欢的魔咒的物品或方块。砂轮就可以被用于移除魔咒。
灵魂绑定魔咒允许物品穿越死亡追随你。但请注意，每次死亡都有概率降低一个附魔等级。降至0时这个魔咒就将完全消失。
ftbquests.chapter.function.quests0.title: Grant EMC View
ftbquests.chapter.function.title: Functional
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests0.desc: 我们第一个目标是要将现有的&b蒸汽&r转化为电力来给机器供能。
&6蒸汽涡轮发电机&r可以使用蒸汽发电，其功率最高可达32EU/t。
你需要线缆才能将涡轮机产出的电力输出。适合低压电的线缆有银线缆、铜线缆和锡线缆，这三种线缆都可以达到256EU/t的传输效率。
If you need more, you should use different cables to make seperate energy networks. Using each of the different cables, you could transfer up to 768 EU/t worth of LV power.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests1.desc: &6装配机&r用于制作科技进展所需要的高级机器、组件和机壳。其处理的原料既有物品，有时还有流体，并且需要供电才能产出产物。
用装配机制作物品前，务必在EMI检查其所需的功率！
NOTE: You can lock input and output slots to prevent certain recipes from crafting. This is important to know for automation. Also, you're going to want A LOT of these eventually!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests10.des: We're now ready to make the journey into a new technological age, the &6LV Age&r.
Each machine in the LV age will require these &bBasic Machine Hulls&r. You'll use &cA LOT&r of them.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests11.des: To fuel one LV Steam Turbine, you will need either 4 Bronze Boilers or 2 Steel Boilers.
Note: You can complete this quest by having either combination in your inventory.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests12.des: &6电动打包机&r可以用来进行许多重要的配方，比如制作&aAE2&r的各种电路板。
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests13.des: The &6 Heatproof Machine Casing&r will be used in a variety of multiblock structures from MI, so you'll definitely want to make a lot!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests13.sub: Let's make some Heatproof Machine Casings!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests14.des: &bA Mixer&r is also a &2very essential&r machine to have from MI, as you'll be using it to &6mix&r a variety of &3Dusts&r and/or &6Materials/Components&r!
- For example, you can &6mix&r &3Quarts Dusts with a piece of Sand&r to get your first &6Silicon&r!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests15.des: 你刚做的&b打包机&r可以用来制作&b电路板&r。
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests15.sub: Yeah baby, time for some AE2!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests16.des: By using your recently obtained &bPacker&r, its time to make some &bPrinted Silicon&r!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests17.des: &eApplied Energistics&r allows you to convert your physical items into a digital form for quick access and storage. To get started you'll need an &benergy accepter&r to convert power into a digital signal capable of energizing the network. Head over to the &eStorage Wars&r chapter to explore more into AE.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests18.des: &6Large Steel Tanks&r can hold a large buffer of liquids for steam or other resources. They also look pretty cool so have at it!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests19.des: &6原子再构机&r可以消耗能量将许多材料转化成更高级的材料。要使用原子再构机，需要将材料以方块或掉落物的形式放在其前端，再使用红石脉冲来激活。
注意：原子再构机需要FE能量，但现代工业化的线缆可以自动将EU转化成FE。
This quest will open up the chapter on
, allowing you to procure power ore and force gems.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests2.desc: &6The Drill&r from Actually Additions is an electric powered mining machine which can be upgraded using various augments.
Note that to use an augment of a higher tier, it requires all of the previous tiers to be installed.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests20.des: &c熔融红石&r是通过高温加热红石而得到的一种不稳定物质。
你有两种方法来制作熔融红石。其一是用&6蒸汽高炉&r来加热红石，另一是在&6热气动加工机&r里将红石与熔岩混合。后者处理速度更快且产量更高。
You'll want an automated supply of this eventually!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests21.des: The &6Empowerer&r will further allow you to take reconstructed atomic matter such as &aVoid&r and &aEnori Crystals&r and empower them to create an even more refined material.
An example of the Empowerer setup:
The recipe for each is shown in EMI, but this machine needs more than just 1 item to work!
With the Empowerer placed in the center, it needs 4 total &6Display Stands&r, each placed 2 blocks away in each cardinal direction. These will need to be powered!
Making the Empowerer will complete the quest, and the Display Stands are given as a reward!
This quest opens up the chapter
, head over there to continue progressing with Equivalent Exchange!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests22.des: &b储能单元&r可以将EU存起来以供之后使用，其传输速率与同等级的发电机一致。
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests3.desc: The &6Polarizer&r gives a magnetic charge to various items. This is primarily useful for making &6Magnetic Steel Rods&r.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests4.desc: The &6Electric Blast Furnace&r is a multiblock designed for smelting using LV energy. It's also required for smelting Bauxite Dust into &bAluminum&r Nuggets!

This multiblock is a 3x4x3 shape, with the two hollow layers of &6Cupronnickel Coils&r in the center. The top and bottom layers are made up of &bHeat Proof Machine Casings&r, and of course the hatches to provide power and bring items in and out.
The next page shows an example of a completed build.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests5.desc: Now that we have an Electric Blast Furnace, we can smelt our &6Bauxite Dust&r into &bAluminium Nuggets&r. You'll be able to make Aluminum more efficiently a bit later, but for now, this is the primary method to get you started!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests6.desc: To get Silicon, you'll need to track down a &6Meteorite&r. These are easily found by using a &bMeteorite Compass&r, made by sending a Compass through the Polarizer.
Inside of the meteorite, you'll find 9 Flawless Budding Certus and a &dMysterious Cube&r that you can be mined to get all of the &aAE2 Inscriber Presses&r.
The Flawless Budding Certus will grow &bCertus Quartz Crystals&r similar to &bAmethyst&r, and can be harvested for crystals and dust. This dust is how we'll create &6Silicon&r.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests7.desc: 要将我们的科技提升到一个新的阶段，我们需要&6电子电路&r等更高级的电路板。这是进入&6中压阶段&r所必须的物品，也是&b通用机械&r的敲门砖！
questline. Head over there to continue delving deeper into Mekanism machines and processing.
for further progress into the MV Technology tier.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests8.desc: 要制作电子电路，我们需要先制作&6电子电路板&r来承载各个元件。
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests8.subt: Just like a Surf Board... for Electronic Components!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests9.desc: &6大型蒸汽锅炉&r是一个多方块结构，其功能与青铜锅炉和钢制锅炉相同。你可以只使用一个&b青铜水泵&r来给其供水，但要达到最高效率，需要2个&b钢制水泵&r来供水。
The Boiler will need plenty of burnable fuel, which can easily be done by making a
You can convert the logs into charcoal in a Coke Oven and burn both the charcoal and the creosote in the Boiler. You may need several coke ovens to keep up with demand!
One &6Large Bronze Boiler&r can support 8 &bLV Steam Turbines&r constantly.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.title: 3. 低压电与质能转换
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests0.des: &6冶金灌注机是&r&e通用机械&r模组中的核心机器。
其可以制作通用机械的各种&b合金&r和&b基础控制电路&r，以解锁后面更高级的配方。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests1.des: The &bOsmium Compressor&r can be used to compress Osmium into stronger alloys that are used in more advanced recipes.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests10.de: &b强化合金&r是通用机械中下一级的合金。
这里非常建议你使用&6富集仓&r来充分利用你的灌注材料。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests11.de: &6通用机械&r中最高等级的合金——&b原子合金&r
这将让你能够制造终极控制电路和传送核心。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests12.de: &b高级控制电路&r用于制造更先进的机器。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests13.de: 由上一级电路制作而成，&b精英控制电路&r是下一级的电路。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests14.de: 制作&b终极控制电路&r将让你解锁本模组最高级别的内容。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests15.de: The &bSpeed Upgrade&r makes machines work faster at the cost of more power.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests16.de: The &bEnergy Upgrade&r is used to make the machine more energy efficient.
If you plan on using any &bSpeed Upgrades&r, I'd personally suggest on using these with them.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests17.de: Tired of those awful noises that these machines make? Slap in a &bMuffling Upgrade&r to quiet it down!
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests18.de: Infusing Obsidian Dust with Diamonds will make us &6Refined Obsidian Dust&r. This is will be used to make more advanced machinery and better tools!
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests2.des: &b钢质机壳&r是制造通用机械模组中大多数机器的基础。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests20.de: 使用&b热力蒸馏塔&r来转化出盐水是制造可再生盐和锂的一种方法。
你可能需要至少2个&b热力蒸馏塔&r。
多方块结构越高，工作速度越快。你可以使用固体燃料加热器或电阻型加热器提供热量。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests21.de: &bMekaSuit&r是一套非常强大且可以&6升级的盔甲&r。
它的&6升级组件&r可以在&6改造站&r安装。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests21.su: 我已经到达终局阶段了吗？
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests22.de: &b超临界移相器&r是一个多方块结构，其可以利用大量的FE来将&6钋气体转化为反物质气体&r。
钋气体可以在化学氧化机中从钋球转化而来。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests23.de: 你可以用聚爆压缩机将&6微量钚&r和&6暗物质&r转换成&b钋&r。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests24.de: &b加压反应室&r可通过Forge能量和高压系统将压缩气体和液体转换成物品和气体输出。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests25.de: 将&b基础工厂安装器&r应用于大多数&e机械动力&r的机器，可将其转变为&6工厂&r。
工厂拥有&6多个加工槽位&r，所以你可以搭建更紧凑的生产线。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests26.de: &b高级工厂安装器&r将基础工厂转换为&6高级工厂&r，它们具有5条并行加工线。
建议使用&6能量升级&r来降低机器的能耗。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests26.su: 制造一个高级工厂安装器
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests27.de: &b精英工厂安装器&r给你提供多达7个加工槽位。
除此之外，配备一些速度升级后，你可能可以轻松处理所有资源。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests27.su: 制造一个精英工厂安装器
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests28.de: &b精英工厂&拥有&69条并行加工线&r。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests29.de: 化学氧化机只需使用Forge能量将物品转化为气体形式。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests3.des: The &bEnrichment Chamber&r is used to &6compress&r items or even &arefine ores&r!
One of the main uses is to convert &cinfusion items&r like coal or redstone into the &6Enriched&r versions. These count for 8 times the base value for infusion purposes!
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests4.des: Using the Infuser, you can enrich &bIron&b with Carbon (from coal or charcoal) to create &6Enriched Iron&r.
Infusing this new iron with more Carbon will create &6Steel Dust&r!
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests8.des: 通用机械中基础级别的控制电路。通过用红石富集锇来制作。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests9.des: 拥有一些红石和锇锭后，你终于可以开始制作一些&b基础控制电路&r，并且可以更快地生产钢，且不需要高炉。
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.title: 机械师
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests0.descr: &6进阶机器外壳&r用于制造各种中压机器，标志着我们进入了&6中压阶段&r。
你可以给现有的低压机器的升级槽插入进阶机器外壳来使其可以接受中压电并处理中压配方。
What, you didn't think you'd have to build all new machines each tier did you?
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests1.descr: The &6Vacuum Freezer&r is a multiblock machine that uses extreme temperatures to cool down items or liquids placed inside.

The multiblock structure is a hollow 3x4x3 structure made up of &6Frostproof Machine Casings&r, and hatches to input items, liquids, and power. Make sure to check the recipes for the total EU/t needed to work!
Here is an example of a completed multiblock Vacuum Freezer!
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests10.desc: Combining &aEthylene&r with &aLead Tiny Dust&r, we can get &6Polyethylene&r.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests11.desc: The &6Chemical Reactor&r is an essential machine to have from &3MI&r!
This machine is used to fuse certain chemicals or items together using &achemical reactions&r, and will be useful for creating many new items and chemicals.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests12.desc: Using the &6Chemical Reactor&r, we can combine &aEthanol&r and &aSulfur Dust&r to create &6Ethylene&r.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests13.desc: By &bDistilling&r &6Sugar Solution&r, you can get &6Ethanol&r which we'll need for making &bEthylene&r.
Note: To complete this quest, you'll need to pump in a bucket's worth into a &cTask Screen&r.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests14.desc: Now that we have access to &bStainless Steel&r and &bPolyethylene&r, our circuits can become even more advanced by making &6Digital Circuit Boards&r!
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests15.desc: The &6Oil Drilling Rig&r uses drills to dig up liquids.
With access to &bAluminum&r, you can make Aluminum Drills to extract &dVirulent Mixture&r from the ground, which can be refined into &2Crude Oil&r in a &bThermo Pneumatic Processing Plant&r.
Once you have access to &6Stainless Steel Drills&r, you can migrate to &6Shale Oil&r and its byproducts.
Tip: Look at the Oil Drilling Rig block with a wrench in your hand to see how to build the structure! You can also place it in your off-hand to continue building.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests16.desc: &bCentrifuging&r &cRedstone&r will give you &6Ruby Dust&r, along with several other useful byproducts including &6Neodynium&r, which you'll use for advanced magnetic applications and superconducting cabling eventually.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests17.desc: The &6Centrifuge&r spins materials at very high RPMs to seperate key components into layers for further extraction.
Your most important use of this right away will be processing &braw iron&r to obtain &6Manganese&r byproducts.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests18.desc: A &6Distillery&r will be essential until you're able to make yourself a &6Distillation Tower&r later in progression.
With some &6Oil&r and the &bDistillery&r, you can now begin refining &2petrochemical byproducts&r.
There are a lot of byproducts and almost all of them will be useful. However, Distilleries can only refine 1 byproduct at a time so you'll need several of these get everything setup.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests19.desc: There are two ways you can get &6Diesel&r.
For the first method, you can use &bDistilleries&r to get &2Light and Heavy Fuels&r, and then use the mixer to combine them into &6Diesel&r.
The other method can be done by refining &2Crude Oil&r using a &9Thermo Pneumatic Processing Plant&r from PNC, which will require pressure and heat.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests2.descr: Once you have your hands on some &bStainless Steel Dust&r, you can run it through an &6Electric Blast Furnace&r to create a &6Stainless Steel Hot Ingot&r.
Run that through the &bVacuum Freezer&r to cool it down into a &6Stainless Steel Ingot&r!
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests20.desc: &6Diesel Generators&r can provide on-demand power by burning different fuels, most notably Diesel.
Unlike Boilers, they will only consume fuel when producing energy, making them an attractive option when you don't fully consume your maximum output regularly.
Remember, &6Diesel&r can also fuel your Boilers should you wish to use it for that!
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests21.desc: With &bPolyethylene&r available, you can craft upgrades for all of your machines!
These upgrades will allow machines to overclock to perform their functions faster at the cost of greater energy consumption (FE/tick).
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests22.desc: Centrifiguring &cRuby Dust&r will yield &6Crushed Chromium&r, which you can further process into &6Chromium Dust&r.
As a nice byproduct, you'll also get pure &bAluminum Dust Piles&r to smelt for &bAluminum Ingots&r.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests23.desc: By &bCentrifuging&r your &bRaw Iron&r, you can extract some &6Manganese&r as well. You'll need this to form more advanced alloys in the future, like &bStainless Steel&r.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests24.desc: Our next step involves some Chemistry!
By &belectrolyzing salt&r, you can extract &6Chlorine&r. This is a useful chemical in fundamental chemistry, and we'll need it to progress!
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests25.desc: For the next step, we'll need to combine &6Hydrogen&r and &6Chlorine&r in equal parts in a &bChemical Reactor&r to make &6Hydrochloric Acid&r (HCL).
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests26.desc: You can combine &bCrushed Chromium&r and &aHydrochloric Acid&r in a &bChemical Reactor&r to make &6Chromium Hydrochloric Solution&r.
This is then &belectroyzed&r to obtain &6Tiny Piles of Chromium&r, as well as reclaiming some of the Hydrogen and Chlorine from the acid mix.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests27.desc: Similar to the process of extracting &bChromium&r, &6Crushed Manganese&r must be combined in a &bChemical Reactor&r with a strong acid, &6Sulfuric Acid&r in this case.
This will provide you with &6Manganese Sulfuric Solution&r, which can then be sent through the &bElectrolyzer&r for &6Tiny Manganese Dust&r.
This process will yield a return of some of the sulfuric acid.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests28.desc: The &6Air Intake&r can go into the Vacuum Freezer to make &9liquid air&r.
This liquid air can then be broken down into atmospheric gases and utilized in metallurgical processes.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests3.descr: These larger pumps provide more power for us to create faster and more pressurized machines.
You'll use many of these in your factory, so it's worth having an automation chain in place for them!
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests30.desc: By using &6Doped Silicon Plates&r over their regular counterparts, you can greatly increase the yield from their various recipes!
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests31.desc: Your &bSteam Quarry&r can be upgraded directly into electric by using the same multiblock!

This new and improved quarry will allow you to use better drills like gold, steel, and stainless steel. If you wish to get into &2petrochemicals&r and &2sustainable diesel fuels&r, it may be worth building an oil drilling rig soon with aluminum drills for Virulent Mixture.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests32.desc: It's worth upgrading your &bLarge Bronze Boilers&r into the advanced versions now that you can make the circuitry. They produce &6four times as much steam&r!
Make sure you use the wrench on the multiblock to see the new shape and block requirements.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests33.desc: Now that we have &bManganese&r and &bChromium Dust&r, we can combine those two with some &bIron&r and &bNickel Dust&r in a Mixer to create &6Stainless Steel Dust&r.
This is needed to make more advanced circuitry, as well as for creating stronger metals to upgrade our Blast Furnace!
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests4.descr: 使用坎塔尔合金线圈来升级电力高炉可以提高处理温度以熔炼更高级的金属。替换线圈后请务必检查电力高炉的UI界面以确保成功升级。
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests6.descr: The &6Electrolyzer&r uses electrical currents to split the bonds between chemicals.
You can &belectrolyze water&r into &aHydrogen&r and &aOxygen&r, or &bBauxite Dust&r into &aAluminum&r directly instead of smelting it for nuggets!
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests7.descr: We have everything we need to upgrade to &6Digital Circuits&r.
This dawns in a new age, the &dHigh Voltage Age&r.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests8.descr: The &6MV Steam Turbine&r consumes up to 128mb/t of &bSteam&r and produces 128 EU/t of Power (or 512 FE/t).
If you haven't already upgraded your Large Bronze Boilers to the advanced versions, now might be the time!
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests9.descr: Larger motors are required for more torque in higher end machines and pumps.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.title: 4. 中压中电中阶段
ftbquests.chapter.quantumania.quests0.de: Our first step into the &dQuantum Machines&r!
Just like all other Hulls, the &6Quantum Machine Hull&r can be used to upgrade your processing machines to the Hull's tier!
ftbquests.chapter.quantumania.quests1.de: If we want our machines to handle quantum levels of power, we'll need to make &dQuantum Upgrades&r.
The first one you make should be used on your Electric Packer to unlock new recipes!
ftbquests.chapter.quantumania.quests2.de: Using an &bImplosion Compressor&r, we can compress an &bUltradense Metal Ball&r with &b64 Nukes&r to create a &dSingularity&r.
That's right, we're compressing 64 Nukes. Surely nothing bad will happen.... right?
ftbquests.chapter.quantumania.quests3.de: Once you get your first &dSingularity&r, you can electrolyze it for &dUU-Matter&r. It will produce 1 mb of UU per operation, but also lasts forever.
ftbquests.chapter.quantumania.quests4.de: The &6Fusion Reactor&r is a &nmassive&r multiblock machine that combines two input fluids to produce &dPlasma&r that is usable for power.
We'll need this to make &dHelium Plasma&r.
ftbquests.chapter.quantumania.quests5.de: Using the &bFusion Reactor&r, we can combine several liquids together to create &dHelium Plasma&r.
There are several recipes for this Plasma! &aHelium 3&r will be the easiest to use, but the others can offer better byproducts as well.
ftbquests.chapter.quantumania.quests6.de: The &dPlasma Turbine&r is the ultimate energy producer. It uses &dHelium Plasma&r to produce over &a1 Million EU/t&r.
That's the power of &mPinesol&r Quantum, baby!
ftbquests.chapter.quantumania.quests7.de: &dQuantum Gear&r is the best there is. You can fly freely for no power cost, never take damage from external sources, and kill any mob in one hit with the &dQuantum Sword&r.
&oIt better one hit mobs since it's technically made out of the power of 64 Nukes.&r
ftbquests.chapter.quantumania.title: 7. 量子之潮
ftbquests.chapter.steelyeyed_engineer.qu: The Engineer's workbench is used to create a variety of speciality components from blueprints. You can craft some of the blueprints and others you may need to find or trade villagers for. Most of these components can later be automated in the Automated Workbench.

The Metal Press is a 3×1×3 multiblock machine. It quickly transforms metal ingots into Plates, Rods, making it a valuable tool for your crafting and building projects. This can provide a simplified on demand production of gears, plates and rods.

Gears are a 6:1 ingot to gear ratio while plates and rods are 1:1. Plates are equivalent to MI in cost while rods and gears are slightly more costly than using MI machines but simpler to automate and produce on demand.
Hard Pressed
&3Actually Addictions&r offers a very interesting machine capable of brewing what you probably drink every morning!
- With some &6Coffee Beans&r, &eEnergy&r and &9Water&r.... a &bCup of Coffee&r!
Also don't forget to check &2JEI&r for some extra things that you may add to &benhance your &bCoffe&r! and remember, &nsome of them are stackable&r!
&8&o~ Here, give me your Cup of Coffe and I'll fill it for you with my Special Brew!&r&r
with this Actually Addictions Machine!
Let's brew some Coffee
And with your recent unlocked materials, you're now able to make &bAdvanced Coils&r!
- With this &bCoil&r you're finally able to make most of the content added by &3Actually Additions&r!
For all your Advanced Additions needs.
A Advanced Component

Perhaps you're not satisfied with your current &6MI Macerator Performance&r... or perhaps you just want to &cspice up some of your Automations&r with a &dReally Pretty Machine&r well in any case, this &bCrusher&r may be the perfect solution for you!
- The &bAA Crusher&r is able to handle most of the &2Crushing Recipes&r so you should be able to use it even for some &2Ore Processing&r!
让我们做一个实用扩展的磨粉机吧！
Crushing with RF
Just like previously mentioned about the &6Single Crusher&r.... it all applys but now in &bDouble&r!
- 2x &2Processing
&r- 2x &e能量消耗
&r- 2x &cSpice&r &8(&oLisan al Gaib)&r
If a Single Crusher don't satisfy your needs...
Crushing with even more Spice!
Tired of your &6Boring Single Furnaces&r?
- &3Actually Additions&r can solve just that! a &bPowered Furnace&r is capable of &aSmelting 2 items at a single time&r! really usefull if you want pretty smelters in some of your automation lines.
双倍更爽！
Double Smelting with RF!
By adding a &6Special Core&r and an &6Advanced Coil&r it is time to improve your simple &2Steam Drill&r and make this very powerfull &3Actually Additions Drill&r!
- But you may ask, what are the benefits of this &bDrill&r? well, you can add &eUpgrades&r to it!
- By &dShift Clicking with it&r you can open its internal buffer and &eadd as many upgrades you want&r!
Time to Improve your Steam Drill!
Drilling your way through!
Want to &dclear a section of your base&r from all the &2Grass&r, &aLeaves&r, &6Dead Bushes&r and almost all things &2natural&r? fear not, a &bLeaf Blower&r can help you with just that!
- Simply &dhold right click&r with it and just &cadmire all the destruction&r that you're gonna be causing!
Let's make a Leaf Blower!
A Hate of All Things Natural
&dPretty straight foward&r with this special device added by &3Actually Additions&r:
- You may &eCharge Any Device&r inside of its &2internal slot&r!
让我们做一个充能站吧！
充能
&dPretty straight foward&r with this special device added by &3Actually Additions&r:
- You may &eDischarge Any Device&r inside of its &2internal slot&r!
让我们做一个释能站吧！
Discharging
&3Actually Additions&r adds a &bvery interesting device&r, one that allows you to produce &bLava out of Energy&r!
- After constructing the &dfollowing structure&r and providing about &e150000FE&r you should be able to &afully automate&r a &cLava Production&r!
让我们做一个熔岩工厂吧！
无限熔岩！

With access to an assembler, it's now possible to make Immersive Engineering and Actually Additions Machines to expand your options for processing. Most of these are optional processing methods that are more suited to on demand tasks.
&3Actually Additions&r adds a very special &bDropper&r that can really make your like easier!
- It will &9Precisely Drop Items&r from its &2internal slot&r in front of it and you may use a &cRedstone Torch&r to configure its &credstone behavior&r.
No, not that Classic Custom Map...
The Best Dropper you'll ever need!
And now that you have a &6Lava Factory&r... this special &bGenerator&r is a real deal!
- By surrounding a &bHeat Collector&r with &c4 Lava Source Blocks&r you'll be &egenerating decent amounts of FE&r!
让我们热能发电机吧！
输出熔岩的能量吧！
And now that we are getting access to some &dadvanced devices&r from &3Actually Additions&r it is time to get the &6Ultimate Machine from this Mod&r!
- &dSimply Place&r an &bEmpowerer&r at the &2Center&r and skip &22 blocks for each cardinal point&r to place the &bDisplay Stands&r.
- &dOne important thing&r, you only need to give &eFE&r to the &bDisplay Stands&r, not the &bEmpowerer&r itself!
我充满了能量！
Time to Empower Materials!
Want some &6Advanced Devices&r? well, what about a way to &2automatically deliver you materials&r? or even, what about a way to &eautomatically charge your devices&r from anywhere in the world?
- A &bPlayer Interface&r allows you to do just that!
- &n&dIt does not have a GUI&r&r tho, so you'll need to use some &apipes&r for the &aIns and Outs&r!
Let's make a Player Interface!
Interacting with your Inventory

&bCanola Oil&r can be a really good &9Liquid Fuel&r to be used in your Factory, and you may consider it a really good option over other &9Liquid Fuels&r since you may &aenhance it&r as you &2progress in the pack&r.

- First, if you haven't set a way to &bAutomatically Farm Canola&r, consider doing so... one suggestion? You can use &ePNC Drones&r! &dThere's a Questline&r for it in the &6"Attack of the Drones"&r Chapter.
Pressing Canola into an Oil!
Producing and Enhancing Canola Part I
As it was mentioned previously &bCanola Oil&r an be &6Refined&r! and the &dfirst stage&r is by using a &bFermenting Barrel&r!
- &dThis process can be a bit slow&r, so may be better if you make more than a &6single barrel&r.
Fermenting Canola Oil into a more Refined Version!
Producing and Enhancing Canola Part II
And now, time to &bImprove&r it even more!
- By Using an &3Atomic Reconstructor&r you'll be able to &6Crystallize some Canola Seeds&r.
- &dAfter this process&r, simply drop it into a pool of &6Refined Canola Oil&r to &dInduce an Enhancement Process&r!
Crystallizing Canola Oil!
Producing and Enhancing Canola Part III
And now, the peak of &9Liquid Fuels&r, &bEmpowered Canola Oil&r!
- Just like the previous Step, make some &bEmpowered Canola Seeds&r and drop them into a pool of &6Crystallized Canola Oil&r to induce an &eEmpowering Reaction&r.
Empowering Canola Oil!
Producing and Enhancing Canola Final Part
使用一个&b铁磁芯&r和一些&6模拟电路&r......一种&a自动种庄稼的轻松方法&r！
- The &bFarmer&r from &3Actually Additions&r can gently &2harvest a 9x9 area&r in front of it 100%% automatially, you just need to provide &eEnergy&r and handle the &2Ins and Outs&r!
让我们来做个农具吧！
一种自动种庄稼的轻松方法！
With this special device added by &3Actually Additions&r you shall easily &acollect scattered items&r around your base!
- &dInside of its GUI&r you may configure &aFilter&r and its &erange is a radius of approximately 6 blocks&r.
让我们来做个物品吸收器吧！
Items the Gathering

Vaccum tubes are a rudimentary subcomponent used in some archaic technologies. You'll most likely want these to get into Chicken Breeding and a few other odds and ends. Can be automated with the automated workbench.
By adding a &bLens&r to the &6Atomic Reconstructor Laser&r you may find some interesting utility features.
- &dAnd the Quests&r around this one should highlight just that!
- To make them simply start by &6Reconstructing&r the &bBasic Lens&r.
Lenses can be quite usefull!
Augmenting your Atomic Reonstructor!
By using this &bLens&r you'll be able to &9cycle trough&r Minecraft's &cC&r&9o&r&2l&r&eo&r&br&r&ds&r from &aDropped or Placed Blocks/Items&r.
Let's make the Lens of the Color!
Lens of the True Gamer
By using this &bLens&r you'll increase the &eRange of the Reconstructor to 30 Blocks&r and it will cause a &cFiery Explosion&r at its end.
Let's make a Lens of Detonation!
Lens of Kaboom
By using this &bLens&r the &6Reconstructor&r will &cinflict 20 of Damage&r &8&o(or about 10 Hearts)&r&r to the &n&bFirst Entity&r&r hit by its &6Laser&r.
Let's make the Lens of Certain Death!
Lens of Omae Wa Mou Shindeiru
This &bLens&r is a straight up &dimprovement&r to the &6Lens of Certain Death&r, it will consume a bit more &eEnergy&r but &ait will drop EXP and Player Only Loot&r.
Let's make the Lens of the Killer!
Lens of even more Omae Wa mou!
By using this &bLens&r you'll be able to Separate &5Enchantments&r to &dEnchanted Books&r!
- Being more specific, it will slip the &5Topmost Enchantment&r from an &2Item&r into a &bBook&r, so you'll need to Drop both an &dEnchanted Item&r aswell as an &bEmpty Book&r.
Let's make the Lens of Disenchanting!
Lens of {1}{W} Destroy target Enchantment
By using this &bLens&r you'll be able to simply convert &aStone into Ores&r!
- Yep, it that simple, although you may need to check &2JEI&r cause some &6Ores&r may not be generated by this &bLens&r and some may be a bit &dRare&r.
Let's make the Lens of the Miner!
An Ancient Lens made by Dwarfs
&6Immersive Engineering&r adds a very interesting mechanic, &2Weapons and Special Ammunition&r for them!
- In this particular quest, We will only highlight the most basic of them, a &bRevolver&r!
1. &dFirst&r make yourself a Common Ammo Blueprint, You'll be using it to fill your &bCartridges&r with &8Gunpowder&r and &9Lead&r.
2. &dThen make sure to&r, of course, make yourself a &bRevolver&r and don't forget, you can place it in an &6Engineer's Workbench&r to Apply &aSkins&r and even &eUpgrades&r!
3. And if you didn't figure how to add &eAmmo&r to your &bRevolver&r, simply &aright click to open its internal chambers&r.
Let's make some Ammo and a Revolver!
Anyway I started Blasting
A Very neat addition from &3Immersive Engineering&r, a &bGarden Cloche&r!
- Simply provide some &9Water&r, &eEnergy&r, a &6Soil&r and and some &2Seeds&r to start growing your &2Crops&r anywhere!
- Also its good to point out that you also provide &lBone Meal&r or items like it to improve your &2Crop growth&r.
- &bThis Device&r may not be the fastest way to grow &2Crops&r, but its definetly a compat way to provide &2Materials for some Automations&r.
Let's make a Garden Cloche
A Pocket Greenhouse
Coming from a simple &6Revolver&r, a &bRailgun&r can be a real improvement, although not that fast to shoot, definetly a strong weapon to have with you.
- But keep in mind, a &bRailgun&r consumes a lot of &eEnergy&r so consider carrying some batteries.

- Oh and don't forget, a &bRailgun&r not only consumes energy but it also requires &6Rods&r, and the ones listed in this quest are the ones compatible with it &a&nbetter materials grant better damage and/or effects&r&r and here's some examples:
- &6Blaze Rods&r set entities on Fire.
- &3End Rods&r can actually hit Endermans.
- &dEnderpearls&r can be shoot from it.
- &bSawblades and Tridents&r can be used to Pierce Armor.
让我们做一个磁轨炮吧！
任意磁轨炮子弹
Say hello to my Little Friend!

Kinetic Dynamos are a simple form of passive power generation. Windmills and Waterwheels make very low amounts of energy but they are endless and passive so some may prefer to use them for certain application. It is not recommended to attempt to power fully functional bases on these alone for a multitude of reasons.
A &bEngineer's Toolbox&r can be a handy thing to have in your hotbar, inside of it you have some specific slots for some things, and those include:
- &6Foods&r, &2Tools&r, &eWiring&r and even some &aWildcard Slots for anything you wish&r!
And much more of course!
A Place to Store your Lunch

An &bIE Crusher&r is a good alternative to a &6Macerator&r if you're going for &5looks instead of efficiency&r, or maybe you could set a special &aautomation line that drops the items on it&r? that could be an interesting thing to build!
- Anyway, the &bIE Crusher&r is able to handle a variety of &eCrushing Recipes&r and can be used during progression if you wish to do so.
- Its a &dhuge multiblock&r so make sure to read the &6Engineer's Manual&r for specific Instructions, or maybe consult the image bellow for a quick glance.
Let's make a IE's Crusher!
A Huge Alternative to a Macerator!
Just like an &6Alloy Kiln&r, the &bArc Furnace&r is capable of handling some &ausefull/unique alloying recipes&r aswell as some &3Common Alloy Smelting&r recipes too.
- And of course &ddo not forget how pretty IE can be&r! sometimes you might just want to &eimprove how a section of your base looks&r by using a cool machine like this one ;)
Let's make an Arc Furnace!
A Huge Alloy Smelter
Not the best &bArmor&r if compared to other options.. but it does provide a &aNeat Feature&r!
- 100%% Immunity to &eIE's Wires&r! Usefull if you don't want to spend your precious resources &6insulating wires&r.
Pharaday's Essential Equipment
No More Damage from Wires!

The Multiblock Diesel Generator can accept most standard fuels and will produce 4096 FE/t. This is equivalent to 4 standalone generators and is also slightly more fuel efficiency. Well worth building once you have access to stainless steel.
When it comes to power, diesel engines never run out of steam!
Rev Your Engines!

Once you have Kanthal coils on an Electric Blast Furnace, you can highly process uranium into HE uranium which will allow you to make an alternate type of passive power using Thermoelectric generators.
These will passively produce energy based on the difference in temperature of the blocks on the opposite side of them. For example, lava on one side and ice on the other.

The blast furnace can be upgraded into an improved blast furnace once you get some steel. This improved blast furnace is faster but can become even faster if you add preheaters onto it and supply some power.

The fluid pump can pump fluids from the world directly, if you have a 2x2 pool of water it can also act as an infinite fluid source. This can be useful for providing waters to boilers and other applications before you can craft the water source block from Super Factory Manager.
With an &6Atomic Reconstructor&r now you're able to make some &cRestonia Crystals&r.
- Use them with some other components to now open up a world of &2interesting additions&r!
&8&oPS: But of course, since this is a basic coil, only some basic ones are available with this coil :p&r&r
For all your Basic Additions needs.
A Basic Component
Using some &6Basic Coils&r and &6Golden Carrots&r, you're now able to easily &dAutomate Mob Breeding&r using &3Actually Additions&r!
- And the best thing is, this &bFeeder&r &eRequires no Energy at all&r! just provide enough &2Food&r and it will &6Feed the Mobs&r until a reasonable amount.
&8&oFeed the Mobs, a brand new Map Based Modpack coming to stores near you!&r&r
让我们做一个自动饲育机吧！
自动饲育
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests0.d: 在Neotech中有多种多样的的箱子可你选择。它们可以升级或可以拓展容量。你甚至可以附魔原版的箱子来增加它们的存储空间！
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests1.d: 所有木材类型都可以用来制作&e精妙存储&r的物品，使用金合欢木的配方只是其中的一个例子。
你需要一些红石来制作它们，所以请确保你已经获得了一些红石粉或者……
on how to process redstone before you've made machines.
The &bME storage bus&r will attach to external storage or tanks to provide access to and from them as part of your &eAE network&r.
The &bcrystal resonance generator&r will passively generate some power for your digital network using the properties of fluix. Due to its unstable nature however you can only use &6one per network&r. This makes them great for starting new networks or powering one off adhoc networks.
Now that you have your items stored in your system you'll want to be able to &aimport&r and &cexport&r items to enable more advanced automations.

Craft an &ainput&r or &coutput bus&r to get started. Each one will take a channel on your network so keep that in mind. Level emitters can be used for stock keeping or limiting operations and &6do NOT&r use a &6channel&r on your network.
&bCrafting CPUs&r are the central block for enabling your AE system to handle crafting operations for you on its own. You'll need to provide a channel on your network for each crafting cpu.

The crafting cpus are a multiblock structure of crafting storage and optionally &6crafting coprocessors&r and &6crafting monitors&r. The more complex the crafting operations, the more crafting storage each recipe will require.
&bPattern Providers&r will allow you to insert recipes that you've set on Patterns using the &6Pattern Terminal&r.

These can be placed next to &6molecular assemblers&r to provide shape and shapeless crafting grid recipe capabilities to your system or they can be attached to machines to provide instructions for your system to use that machine to perform crafts.
The &bannihilation&r and &bformation panes&r can place blocks or mine them when given a channel and connet to your network (or more commonly, a subnetwork). If you place annihilation panes facing upworld at &6build height&r they can collect &6skystone&r for you as well!
When normal storage and patterns just aren't enough for you anymore you can turn towards MEGA storage solutions. These will help millions of bytes of chemical, liquid and item data. The accumulation processors are the key component in these massive storage technology solutions.
远距离传输流体或搬运物体可能会对你造成一点麻烦。&e维度储罐&r和&e维度箱子&r可以远距离甚至跨维度存储或转移物品！
The Ae2 Controller will allow you to extend your network's channels by 64 channels PER SIDE of the controller face. They also fit together into a multiblock in a variety of closed loop shapes.
在最新版本的&e应用能源&r（简称AE）中搜索栏已被移除。如果想要在数字存储中找到特定物品，你需要使用位于屏幕下方&eEMI&r搜索栏。
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests2.d: 忘记有关&6潜影盒&r的一切吧！&e精妙背包&r可以满足你的所有需求。
你可以对&e精妙背包&r进行升级来获得很多实用的功能，比如使用&6虚空升级&r可以通过过滤器来自动将一部分物品销毁！
着手制作升级时，你需要一个过滤升级。因为有许许多多的升级方法，所以请使用EMI确保你找到了所有的升级！
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests3.d: 远古陨石从天空坠落,你可以从这块天空之石的内部层层保护的深处发现带有先进科技的高级电路示意图的神秘方块。从中获取一套完整的压印模板和一些赛特斯石英母岩，将上述物品带回基地种植即可源源不断获得赛特斯石英水晶。&b陨石罗盘&r会为你找到距离你最近的陨石。
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests4.d: Now with some fluix you can begin working on your first network. AE2 Devices require channels on your network to operate.

Noramlly you can fit 8 devices per network but we've &ndoubled that in this pack&r to &616 channels&r. You can go even further by incorporating Controllers later, with each face providing you &664 additional channels&r to work with.
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests5.d: 要完成处理器的装配工序，你需要一些熔融红石。其中一种办法是在&6蒸汽高炉&r中制作，另一种方法最好需要有稳定的熔岩来源，使用&6热气动加工机&r可以更高效的制作熔融红石。熔融红石需要使用管道进入装配机中与其他电路组件一起来完成装配工序。
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests6.d: 合成终端将允许你访问网络中存储的所有物品，并能直接在任意一个地方进行物品合成。就像大多数AE设备一样，它会占用你网络上的一个频道。
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests7.d: 你需要一个&bME驱动器&r槽来容纳所有的存储元件。这个&bME驱动器&r将在你的网络上&6占用一个频道&r，以提供对所有插入的存储元件进行数字访问。
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests8.d: 存储元件是你数字存储的核心。它们有多种尺寸，从1k到256k，甚至还有MEGA版本。
Item storage cells can hold up to 63 &ndistinct types&r of items; the number of items they can store depends in part on how many types they're holding;

Each item type consumes a number of bytes (which varies with the cell size), and each item consumes &6one bit&r of storage, so eight items consume one byte, and a &6full stack of 64 consumes 8 bytes&r.
This will become intuitive as you use the mod but if you find this confusing there are also the &6Typeless drives&r available from &eAe2Things&r that cost a bit more but have no type limitations.
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests9.d: &b ME Interfaces&r allow you to pipe items &ainto&r and &4out&r of your digital storage. They act a bit like an &aimport&r and &4export&r bus combined. You can set items to &4export&r in the top of the interface's UI and any items you pipe into it will automatically go into your network.
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.title: 存储战争
ftbquests.chapter.the_final_challenge.qu: Congratulations! You have reached the pinnacle of technological mastery and completed FTB NeoTech. Your dedication, creativity, and perseverance have led you through countless challenges, and you have emerged victorious.

On behalf of the entire FTB Team, we extend our heartfelt thanks to you for taking this journey with us. Your commitment to exploring and mastering the intricate world of NeoTech has most certainly brought you an immense
Thank you for being a part of our adventure. We hope you enjoyed the experience and look forward to seeing you in future packs!

Once you've got a chicken that laid the fiery egg, or an actually additions lava factory, making lava becomes much less of an issue. To that end we'll not have to keep milking the little clucker for eternity. Once you've produced 10k Buckets of lava you'll gain access to this infinite source.
NOTE: This quest is PETA approved.
ftbquests.chapter.the_garden_beneath.que: The catalyst will work as a portal ignited to allow passage into the &bUndergarden&r. Build a portal frame out of stone bricks and right click the catalyst on the inside of it to engage the portal. Be weary, as there are dangers beyond which may overwhelm the unprepared...
There are many biomes and structures to explore in the Undergarden, a &bNature's Compass&r can assist you in finding any specific ones you may be looking for!
深暗之园
进入深暗之园
The Key to the Door Below
The Undergarden is filled with materials embedded in its native stone.
This stone seems malleable enough to simply &lsmelt directly &rto &bdiamonds&r.
&nINFO: &rThese ores occur at high levels, around Y level 112 and up, with the best place to dig being around Y level 120.
Undergarden Diamonds
Cloggrum is a basic material similar to Iron but a bit stronger in terms of tools and armor. You can mine it throughout the entire dimension. Try making a shield from it!
You can also trade Stoneborn for the mythical Cloggrum Battleaxe, a huge weapon that deals knockback and high damage.

Deep within the lower levels of the Undergarden are ancient labrynths know as the catacombs. You can find them most commonly near the ancient seas but they can occur in most biomes. They will be filled with hostile monsters and A LOT of loot. Be careful and enjoy your bounty!
Locate the Catacombs!

Inside the catacombs you will find Forgotten Guardians. These are the only source of Forgotten Steel which will allow you to upgrade your cloggrum tools and armor into Forgotten Steel variants. These tools and weapons do 1.5x more damage to Undergarden enemies and mine blocks at 1.5.x the speed. They also have a much higher enchantability.
&bVirulent Mix&r can be bucketed up and refined into crude oil for processing.

This process is a bit manual to start so filling tanks to bring back home is a good way to go. The Virulent Mix deposits can occur in many biomes but &a&lVeil Mushroom Bogs&r will have the greated abundance.
Once you can provide a quarry an aluminium drill it will be able to constantly pump this mixture which you can sustainably produce &bcrude oil&r and petrochemical byproducts with.
&6Endermen&r drop &6Ender Pearls&r when killed which can teleport you when you throw them! These can also be combined with &6Blaze Powder&r to guide you to a &6Stronghold&r.
Inside, you'll find a portal that can be activated to take you to the &dEnd Dimension&r. To activate it, you'll need each portal frame filled with an &6Eye of Ender&r.
We can use this same power to create teleportation devices called &eSimple Teleporters&r. To learn more, check the next page!

With this you can bind an &6ender crystal&r to a location  by &6sneak+right clicking the ground&r with it and insert it into the teleporter. Once you step onto the teleporter and sneak you'll be teleported to the set location. You can do this as often as you like and it has no cost. &dThis does not work across dimensions&r, however.
All Seeing Eye
For when the &5Nether&r is too dangerous and filled with too much terrain, the &dVoid&r Dimension provides you with all the empty void needs. Mobs won't spawn and it's always sunny.
Home in the Void
From dangerous structures filled with Piglins, to the never ending sea of lava, the &5Nether&r has many things to offer on your adventures.
Keep an eye out for &eLootr&r Chests and Barrels you find there for some nice loot, alongside looking out for the fabled &6Ancient Debris&r that can be found underground.
P.S. You might also want a &6Golden Armor&r piece or &6Gold Backpack&r to distract some of its inhabitants...
造访下界
当你在&5下界&r时，记得前往下界堡垒击杀一些&b凋灵骷髅&r，它们的&0凋灵骷髅头颅&r可以用来召唤凋灵。只需将三个&0凋灵骷髅头颅&r放在T字形的&6灵魂沙&r上即可。
击杀&d凋灵&r
造访&d末地&r
The undergarden is filled with many various types of mushrooms. They can be harvested and crafted into various stews and pies, each giving unique effects.
Bloodmushrooms can brew potions of brittleness which increases damage taken and increases it even more so if the target is wearing armor!
Undershrooms
Local Vegetation
击杀&d末影龙&r

There are strange purple pumpkins and beans growing wild across the Forgotten Fields. Harvest some for food and other crafting processes later. The Gourd can be particularly useful in unlocking a &bMarket&r.
Gourds and Legumes
The water in the Undergarden isn't normal water but a Virulent Mixture that will deal poison if you walk through it. You can avoid this by brewing some poitons of resistance using a Gloom Gourd.
Utherium shards can drop from enemies, be looted from chests or mined from Utherium ores in the undergarden. When crafted into crystals they act as a powerful material for weapons, tools and armor.
Rotwalkers and Rotbeasts are a common source of these shards.
Iron, Gold, and Coal variants of Undergarden ores are found commonly throughout most biomes. You can process them as you would any normal ore. Noteably, &6Gold&r does not spawn in cold biomes.
Undergarden Common Ore
普通矿石
&bRegalium&r can be found as ore and looted in chests throughout the Undergarden. This crystal is highly sought after by the denizens of the deep known as the &lStoneborn&r.
You can use it to trade with them like Villagers.
You can find them anywhere but they particularly like &aWigglewood Forests&r.

Utheric equipment is better than diamond tier gear and deals additional damage to &erotspawn&r of all type. It has a good enchantability level as well. It's worth aquiring a full set of this armor and a sword for fighting the enemies in the Undergarden.
Utherium Gear

Froststeel Ore only spawns in cold biomes in place of where gold would have spawned. Weapons made from Froststeel will slow enemies when hitting them. The armor gives knockback resistance and high defense. but slows you down slightly.
ftbquests.chapter.the_spice_of_life.ques: Enables your multiblock kitchen to make recipes that require standard crafting grid recipes.
The sink will provide water to recipes. &6It cannot provide water to other non kitchen appliance&r via piping.
The Inspiration for most Modpacks
The &bMarket&r will allow you to trade emeralds for almost every type of crop available to perfect your garden to your liking.
This little piggie...
The &btool rack&r will allow you to place your Pam's cooking instruments like bakeware on it and automatically use them to prepare recipes in your multiblock kitchen.
Gardens can provide many of the various crops from Pam's Harvestcraft. You can get them from village loot or from trading on the Amadron Network.
丰收时刻！

In need for some milk but are your local cows to far away? Worry not a &bCow in a Jar&r is there for your milky needs. To obtain one of these fabled Jars you need to find a wild &6cow&r put it ontop an &6Milk Jar&r and let an &6Anvil&r drop ontop of it.
&l&6Note&r: there needs to be 1 Air block between the cow and the falling anvil
哞？
A &bKitchen Floor&r can be used to connect kitchen appliances alongside being able to be dyed, never have your Kitchens looked as fancy as they are functional!

FTB Neotech includes The Spice of Life: Oninon Edition. This version will reward you with buffs and extra hearts for eating a varied diet. You can check you current diversity, as well as foods you have eaten in the &2food book&r. Craft one to get started working on improvements.
&2生活调味料&r
To get started with &6Cooking For Blockheads&r, you'll need to craft the guide book first! The first book just requires you to smelt a book, so get.... cooking?
The next book requires a little bit more of an investment, but it's essential for crafting the core blocks needed for a proper kitchen!
It's called a cookbook for a reason

This is the main counter space for your multiblock kitchen. They are optional but you can combine them anyway you like to make your kitchen look nice. &6These can by dyed to suit your colorful needs&r.
These act as decorative storage for the multiblock kitchen. They are optional but adding more will provide more storage for food.
Most of the Kitchen Blocks can be &6Dyed&r to meet your Aesthetic requirements.
Primary ingredient storage for your recipes. It can be upgraded as well to provide additional functionality.
When an &bice unit&r is placed in the fridge as an ugrade it will provide snow and ice to cooking recipes automatically.
Used to providing cooking processes for recipes that require it. It's also &6upgradeable and Dyeable.&r
The heating upgrade will allow you to provide FE energy to your oven instead of burnable fuels.
&bThe feeding trough&r will provide food for all nearby animals in order to allow them to breed automatically.

&bThe chicken nest&r will collect nearby eggs that chickens drop. You can place a hopper under it to pipe into the storage of your choice. No more need to cram all your chickens into a block over a hopper.
The Chicken came home to roost.

You can enhance the speed and yield of your crops with these &benhanced fertilizers&r. One you apply them to the farmland it lasts forever. Combined with worms from Actually Additions, Crop Supports from Pneumaticcraft and Optionally Greenhouse Glass your crops will be growing in no time!
Get green thumb
Enhanced Fertilizer
Enhanced Fertilizer
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests0: A lot goes into making a &dNuclear Reactor&r, and there are many types. To explain the process, check out the &bReactor Components&r and &bReactor Mechanics&r quests linked to this one!
&dNuclear Reactors&r produce a lot of energy, primarily as Steam.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests1: The most basic available reactor fuel is a regular &6Uranium Fuel Rod&r. It requires no fancy processing, but also outputs the least amount of energy. However, its simplicity makes it appealing to start with.
Whose Ranium?
Because EMI is likely making your head spin at trying to understand this, here is a simplistic overview of the many reactor mechanics.
&6Temperature&r: When a Thermal Neutron is absorbed, it raises the temperature of the component in question.
&6Thermal Conductivity&r: The ability for the component to transmit heat. Sends heat from hot things to less hot things.

&6Neutron Emission&r: Fuel rods emit &6neutrons&r, which start reactions. Neutrons can be Fast or Thermal, with a percent chance of being either, per neutron. &6Fuel rods&r can emit the maximum number of neutrons as seen in EMI or less depending on the temperature the fuel rod is at. Fuel rods will also emit neutrons when they absorb incoming neutrons.

&6Neutron Absorption&r: Fuel rods and reactor components have a chance to absorb an incoming fast neutron. If this occurs, the fuel rod will emit more neutrons, while other components will take a tick of durability.

&6Neutron Scattering&r: Incoming neutrons have a chance to be &bdeflected into other spaces&r. The direction it travels is random. The neutron type has a chance to become either Fast or Thermal, depending on the chance listed on the component's EMI page.

&6Neutron Travel&r: If a traveling neutron does NOT scatter or be absorbed, it "passes through" the component, maintaining its direction of travel. If a neutron travels into an unoccupied space (AKA any non-hatch), it disappears.
反应堆机械
Welcome to the &dNuclear Age&r! It's time to start having fun with Extreme Voltage!
The &dHighly Advanced Machine Hull&r is used for nearly all your EV tier technologies, and just like before, you can use them to upgrade your processing machines!
&dHighly Advanced Machines&r
The &6High Pressure Advanced Steam Boiler&r is a direct upgrade for the &bHigh Pressure Steam Boiler&r and can produce up to 8192 mb/t of Steam.
As with most boilers, to achieve maximum efficiency, the boiler must be in continuous operation. It only accepts High-Pressure Water and High-Pressure Heavy Water so you have to use a pressurizer.
We'll need stronger motors to make better machines. These can also provide a faster item transfer rate in pipes!
Of course there is a &6Large Advanced Pump&r.
While these upgrades can be made to upgrade our machines, we can also make it for some better armor!
If we use our &6Titanium Drills&r in our Quarry, we can harvest &dIridium Ore&r.
You'll probably also have some &6Iridium Tiny Dust&r from your Platinum processing chain!

&dSuperconductor Ingots&r are used to make the highest tier of energy transfer cables available. These cables can transfer an astounding &d1.024G EU/t&r. This metal is also used for many of the late game technology recipes.

To make these, you'll need to start by mixing the dust form of Iridium, Annealed Copper, Yttrium, and Neodymium together in a mixer. This will give us &6Super Conductor Dust&r, which we can smelt in an Electric Blast Furnace into a hot ingot.
Cool that ingot down in either a Vacuum Freezer or Heat Exchanger and you'll get a &dSuperconductor Ingot&r!
1.024 GIJJAAWHATS
Durability is a thing of the past!
The &dGravichestplate&r uses energy and enables you to have &dCreative Flight&r!
Creative Flight!
&dGravichestplate&r
You're playing with Nuclear Reactors, so the most obvious next step would be to make a &dNuke&r.
Only for testing purposes, of course. :)
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests2: &dTitanium Drills&r are essential for producing mass quantities of &6Uranium, Iridium,&r and &6Fluorite&r.
You're going to need a fair amount of Uranium for Nuclear Power, as well as Iridium for highly advanced components.
It's going to take everything you've learned so far to make the ultimate circuit: the &dQuantum Circuit&r.
As long as you are observing the circuit, it will stay as one whole circuit. :)
To make a &dNuclear Reactor&r, you'll need &6Nuclear Alloy Plates&r. These are crafted using &bBlastproof Ingots, Beryllium Ingots, and Cadmium Ingots&r.
To get Beryllium, you'll need to centrifuge &2Emeralds&r. You should already have some &bCadium&r ready to go from processing &bMonazite&r.

Once you have Nuclear Mixed Plates, blow them up in an &bImplosion Compressor&r to create &6Nuclear Alloy Plates&r. You’ll need plenty of these for your reactors so its worth setting up a good automation line for them.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests3: &dUranium 235&r is a rare isotope of Uranium, as opposed to Uranium 238, its more common sibling.

When processing Nuclear Fuel Rods that used 235 in their recipe, you will get back 2/3 of the 235 you used to create it, meaning that you will need to constantly be centrifuging Uranium to get more 235.
These produce more energy than the regular Uranium Fuel Rods, but less than Plutonium-based ones.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests4: &dPlutonium&r is a manufactured material from &6Depleted Fuel Rods&r. To get a lot of it, you might want to invest in a Breeder Reactor.

A &6Breeder Reactor&r is generally one which seeks to process fuel rods as quickly as possible with little regard for efficiency. Of course, you will need to be generating Uranium at a quick enough rate to supply it.
Plutonium rates (per rod) are as follows (Tiny Dust in -> Tiny Dust out):
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests5: &dMOX Fuel&r is generally superior to regular Uranium Fuel, with an added benefit that it produces more &6Plutonium&r than it takes to make it. A 1.33x surplus, to be precise.
This does NOT make it suitable for dedicated Plutonium production, but it does mean that you don't lose much by using it. Its high neutron output might be appealing.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests6: By mixing Uranium 235 and 238 together, we can get HE Uranium Dust.
These can be processed into &dHE Uranium Fuel Rods&r for more efficiency!
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests7: &dDeuterium&r is a byproduct of Water in a Nuclear Reactor when it is hit with a Fast Neutron. It can be used to make Heavy Water.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests8: &dTritium&r is the byproduct of when Heavy Water gets hit by a Fast Neutron in a Nuclear Reactor.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests9: There are a lot of reactor components to keep track of, so here is a list of each of them and their function(s)!
&bCadmium Control Rod&r: A special component that has a high chance of absorbing incoming Thermal Neutrons.

&bFuel Rods&r: These come in many varieties, and are your main &6nuclear force&r. They are responsible for providing the reactor with energy. &6Quad Rods&r last much longer than &bSingle or Dual Rods&r (while they theoretically last 4x longer, this might not be the case, as higher reactivity will cause them to degrade quicker). Their emissivity decreases with temperature.
&bPlates&r: A general-use conductive and reflective surface. Has a high chance of converting incoming Fast Neutrons into Thermal Neutrons.

&bHeat Exchanger&r: A component designed for managing internal reactor temperature. Has a high thermal conductivity, meaning it can take heat from adjacent sources and send it to adjacent destinations.

&bWater&r: Comes in several varieties. Pressurized versions are more energy-dense, and Heavy Water produces &bTritium&r instead of &bDeuterium&r. Produces Deuterium when absorbing a Fast Neutron and increases in temperature (and turns to Steam) when absorbing a Thermal Neutron.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.title: 6. 突破极限
ftbquests.chapter.use_the_forcecraft.que: 想要开始&6力量工艺&r，你需要获取一些&6力量宝石&r。
获取这些宝石需要你深入研究&a实用拓展&r，从而能够使用贴附有&6矿工透镜&r的原子再构机，将绿宝石块转化为力量宝石块。
你也可以用同样的方法转化绿宝石矿。
&6力量灌注台&r基本可以说成是力量工艺的&d附魔台&r！
与原版的附魔机制不同，你可以放入特定的物品来给你的工具和护甲附加对应&6灌注&r，也可以用于制作一些高级物品，比如&a时间火把&r。
要解锁灌注配方，你需要升级你的&6升级册&r。每次升级都需要完成特定的灌注至少一次，这条任务线将会指引你完成并解锁各个升级！
这些剪刀能剪包括羊在内的许多动物，给它们一件舒适的冬季外衣！
制作一个&b升级核心&r需要将力量权杖与经验册合成，这个配方需要经验册内有至少原版7.5级的经验，也就是100点经验。
用&b附魔之瓶&r灌注升级核心就能得到一个经验核心，这个核心可以用于力量熔炉，使熔炉产生更多经验。
经验核心
在力量灌注台中用&b附魔之瓶&r灌注一本书将得到经验册，可以用于存储经验以备之后使用。
等级2
将&b雪饼&r灌注于力量弓可以为箭矢附加冻结效果；灌注于升级核心则可以获得冻结核心，以解锁力量熔炉中的冷冻配方。
冻结升级
将&b燧石&r灌注于升级核心可以获得磨光核心，这个核心插入力量熔炉后可以使其变成一个磨粉机。
磨光核心
&b力量背包&r基本上可以说是一个普通的背包，虽然初始槽位很少，但它可以用力量灌注台升级。
这个背包看起来很可疑
将&b力量背包升级&r灌注于力量背包可以为你可疑的背包增加8个槽位。
&4注意：升级册的每个等级中，都仅能进行一次背包升级。
制作并吃掉一块&b幸运饼干&r，你将得到你的&b幸运签&r。将&b幸运签&r灌注于力量剑或弓可以获取抢夺魔咒；灌注于其它工具可以获取时运魔咒；灌注于力量护甲可以使你的力量拳套带有抢夺效果。
将&b蓝色染料&r灌注于力量剪刀将给予其&4R&r&ca&r&ei&r&2n&r&9b&r&1o&r&5w&r效果，剪羊毛时掉落随机颜色的羊毛。
&4R&r&ca&r&ei&r&2n&r&9b&r&1o&r&5w&r剪刀
你可能已经注意到，力量工艺强化手册初始为0级。为了升级强化手册，你需要每种注魔至少使用一次，且还需确保使用了足够的注魔以获取所需的经验值。在0级时，您需要将蝙蝠&b爪子&r注入到剑、弓或力量护甲中。
将&b爪&r灌注于力量剑可以获取锋利I魔咒；灌注于力量弓可以获取力量I魔咒；灌注于力量护甲则可以使你的力量拳套增加固定数值的伤害。
等级0
将&b糖&r灌注于升级核心可以获得速度核心，这个核心放入力量熔炉后，就如其名称所示，可以加速它们。
速度核心
将&b箭&r灌注于力量弓、箭、或护甲将赋予它们流血，使你的攻击造成流血伤害。
等级3
将&b隐身药水&r灌注于力量权杖后，只要权杖还有耐久，玩家就可以根据自己的需求使用隐身药水效果；而灌注于力量护甲将使护甲隐形，展现你令人惊艳的皮肤！
迷彩
将&b力量背包升级&r灌注于力量背包可以为你可疑的背包增加8个槽位。
&4注意：升级册的每个等级中，都仅能进行一次背包升级。
力量背包升级II
将&b蜘蛛网&r灌注于力量工具可以获取精准采集魔咒。
丝触
将&b蜘蛛眼&r灌注于力量剑、弓或护甲可以获取祸根，一个强大的灌注效果，能无效特定生物的能力，例如苦力怕将不会爆炸，末影人将无法传送。
等级4
将&b金色能量源&r灌注于升级核心则可以获得热量核心，允许你用更少的燃料熔炼更多物品。
热量升级
将&b力量背包升级&r灌注于力量背包可以为你可疑的背包增加8个槽位。
&4注意：升级册的每个等级中，都仅能进行一次背包升级。
力量背包升级III
将&b恶魂之泪&r灌注于力量权杖后，只要权杖还有耐久，玩家就可以使用这个力量权杖治疗自身。
等级5
将&b力量背包升级&r灌注于力量背包可以为你可疑的背包增加8个槽位。
&4注意：升级册的每个等级中，都仅能进行一次背包升级。
我们需要使用力量权杖来为我们自己制作一本&6升级册&r，以使用本模组的主要功能方块之一。
&6升级册&r可以通过完成特定&d灌注&r来升级，我们将会在下一个任务中详细讲述。把它当作是附魔物品就好！
将&b羽毛&r灌注于力量剑使你可以右键将自己向前推动一段距离。但请注意，这消耗耐久。
羽翼
将&b末影珍珠&r灌注于力量弓将使被击中的敌人随机传送；而灌注于力量权杖或力量剑将使它们可以被用作传送装置。
等级6
将&b黑曜石&r灌注于力量护甲将减少身穿该护甲的实体所受伤害；而灌注于工具则会使工具获得耐久魔咒。
强健
将&b时钟&r灌注于力量火把将给你一个你所能获取的最强大工具之一，&b时间火把&r，这个火把可以加速附近的机器。
将&b荧石&r灌注于力量权杖，使用者可以获得使附近生物发光的能力；灌注于力量弓则可以使被击中的生物发光。
等级7
将&b宝藏核心&r灌注于力量斧或力量剑将使生物开始掉落宝藏卡，可以用于制作战利品袋，这些战利品袋装有一些好东西。当你完成了这一灌注，你就完成了力量工艺所提供的所有灌注！
将一个力量宝石与2个&6铁锭&r或2个&6金锭&r合成就能得到&6力量锭&r。使用铁锭合成只能得到2个力量锭，而用金锭则可以得到3个！
&6力量权杖&r是你在本模组中将要使用的第一个主要物品！
这个权杖可以用于将特定物品拆解为它其中一种原料，也可以用于制作几种重要方块和物品！
在力量工艺中，&b砂轮&r将是你的好朋友，它使你能够祛除惹人厌烦的工具上的魔咒，并使用同一把工具来升级你的升级册。
将&b糖&r灌注于力量工具可以获取效率魔咒；灌注于力量弓可以使它的箭矢飞得更快；而灌注于力量护甲可以使穿着这件护甲的实体的速度提高一个固定的数值。
等级1
将&b力量原木&r灌注于力量斧将使其获得一次砍倒整棵树的能力。
将&b力量粒&r灌注于力量剑可以获取击退I魔咒。你需要完成这个灌注至少一次才能将你的升级册升级为等级1。
&b金色能量源&r可以灌注于大部分力量工具来使它们产生高温；灌注了这一能力的力量剪刀可以在剪动物时点燃它们；灌注了这一能力的每件力量护甲将会使玩家的攻击附加一个固定数值的火焰伤害。
ftbquests.chapter.useful_utilities.quest: &bA Building Gadget&r can pretty much &dsolve any problems that you've had or probably will have&r with &2Building&r!
- Its advised to set a keybind to open the Menu.
- On its Menu, you'll be able to use a variety of &2building functions&r, like placing a row of blocks from where you're looking to where you are.
Or maybe placing a grid of &etorches&r to keep your base lit. Or even placing entire &2walls, floors and ceilings&r with a single click.
The Possibilities are endless! These gadgets are &2handy companions for builders&r.
For Dire Builders
A Dire's Gadget
The &bSlimesling and Slime Boots&r let you travel the landscape rather quickly. The boots even protect you from fall damage, at the cost of forcing you to bounce unless you hold sneak.
Modular Routers are versatile tools for logistics and world interaction. There are many Modules that you can insert into them, which all do different things. Most of them are self explanatory.
MAKE SURE YOU ENABLE FAKE PLAYERS IN CLAIM CHUNKS!
Are you tired of the Wandering Trader? Is he pushing you around while you are looking at your quests? Now you can make a sign to solve all of your problems!
This sign prevents traders from spawning in a 100 block radius from the sign.
"Or you can just keep killing them for me." - AlfredGG
&bThis Neat Pouch&r allows you to slowly collect &eTime&r as you keep it &ain your Inventory.&r
- After some its accumulated, you can &dright click to release it into any block&r!
- And well... this is really usefull to &6quickly smelt or process something that you're in need&r!
让我们做个时间之瓶吧！
A Temporal Pouch for all your Temporal Problems!
Just like the &6Compact Machines Mod&r, &bA Hyperbox&r is able to provide a &e13x13x13&r Area&r for anything that you desire!
- One thing to keep note is that you'll need to use the &bApperture Blocks&r inside of it to move items, redstone signals and even yourself &aIn and Out&r of it.
Let's make a HyperBox!
A Compact Space for your Compact Machines!
T&bhis Powerfull Torch&r shall completely stop &cAgressive Mob Spawning&r on an radious of &a64x32 Blocks&r.
- &2Very Usefull&r if you're tired of &6Mobs on your base&r!
Let's make a Diamond Magnum Dong
Completely Removing Mobs from your Base!
The &bMagnet&r is a nifty gadget that attracts nearby item entities to you.
The &bHang Glider&r is a way to cross long horizontal distances, so long as you start from a high y-level.
ftbquests.chapter.useful_utilities.title: 实用工具
ftbquests.chapter.warning_high_voltage.q: The &6Turbo Machine Hull&r is used as the base building block for &dHigh Voltage&r machines.

Similarly to using &bAdvanced Machine Frames&r, your existing processing machines can all be upgraded to this new voltage should you wish by either using the Hull directly on the machine, or by placing it in the upgrade slot of the machine.
The &6Stainless Steel Drill&r will allow you access to new and important materials!
By using these drills in your &bElectric Quarry&r, you can obtain new ores like Titanium, Platinum, and Tungsten.
By using these drills in the Oil Drilling Rig, you can get your hands on &6Shale Oil&r which can be further &bDistilled&r into most of your &2petrochemical&r needs.
By &bPacking&r 3 incredibly strong ingots, you can make &6Mixed Blastproof Ingots&r!
These are needed to make the &bImplosion Compressor&r, which can then make &6Mixed Blastproof Ingots&r more efficiently.
The &6Implosion Compressor&r is used to place items under much more intense pressure than a normal compressor. This allows you to transform dusts and ingots into &bhighly blast resistant materials&r.
Most of these materials will be required for Nuclear technologies. :)
By combining &6Raw Platinum Ore&r with &6Sulfuric Acid&r in a Chemical Reactor, we can make &6Platinum Sulfuric Solution&r.
Platinum Sulfuric Solution
By Centrifuging our new Platinum Sulfuric Solution, we can extract &6Purified Platinum Sulfuric Solution&r, with a small chance to get &6Iridium Tiny Dust&r as a byproduct.
Now we can take an electrolyze the purified solution to create &6Platinum Tiny Dust&r! With 9 of these, you can create &dPlatinum Dust&r.
From here, you can run this through your &bElectric Blast Furnace&r to create a Platinum Hot Ingot, then through either a Vacuum Freezer or Heat Exchanger to cool it down!
With access to &bStainless Steel Drills&r, we can harvest &6Shale Oil&r from our oil drilling rig.
Once you have a &bDistillation Tower&r, we can run this through to get &6Helium&r, &6Sulfuric Naptha&r, and &6Sulfuric Crude Oil&r.
Shale Oil Processing
Once you've obtained &6Sulfuric Crude Oil&r, you can process it with &bHydrogen&r in a Chemical Reactor to get &6Sulfuric Acid&r and &6Crude Oil&r.
